AccountInformationManagement.description: Manage your account information including name, email address, and password.

form.name: Name
form.passwordNote: Leave blank to keep current password

form.enableCreditPaymentPlaceholder: Enable credit card payment processing for this merchant

form.title: Edit tax settings
form.taxableHelp: Toggle whether tax should be applied for this merchant.

validation.taxRateInvalid: Tax rate must be a valid number
validation.taxRateMin: Tax rate must be at least 0
validation.taxRateMax: Tax rate must be less than or equal to 100

InvoiceManagement.title: Invoice Management
InvoiceManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this invoice?
InvoiceManagement.publicInvoiceNotFoundDescription: No invoice exists for invoice number: {invoiceNumber}
InvoiceManagement.publicInvoiceNotFoundHint: Check the link and try again.
InvoiceManagement.publicAlreadyHaveAccount: If you already have an account
InvoiceManagement.billIntro: We hereby invoice you as follows.
InvoiceManagement.payInfoTransferHelp1: The transfer will be made to your counterparty's account using the name you entered.
InvoiceManagement.payInfoTransferHelp2: Please enter within 30 characters using full-width Katakana, alphanumerics, and symbols (・。()「」/.-¥ space).

InvoiceAutoIssuance.title: Invoice Auto-Issuance
InvoiceAutoIssuance.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this invoice?
InvoiceAutoIssuance.publicInvoiceNotFoundDescription: No invoice exists for invoice number: {invoiceNumber}
InvoiceAutoIssuance.publicInvoiceNotFoundHint: Check the link and try again.
InvoiceAutoIssuance.publicAlreadyHaveAccount: If you already have an account
InvoiceAutoIssuance.billIntro: We hereby invoice you as follows.
InvoiceAutoIssuance.payInfoTransferHelp1: The transfer will be made to your counterparty's account using the name you entered.
InvoiceAutoIssuance.payInfoTransferHelp2: Please enter within 30 characters using full-width Katakana, alphanumerics, and symbols (・。()「」/.-¥ space).

form.createTitle: Create received payable invoice auto issuance
form.editTitle: Edit received payable invoice auto issuance

validation.publicationPeriodInvalid: Publication end date must be after start date
